skills.skill: Debugging Code and Log File Analysis

duties_responsibilities.duty: Software Engineer with a Salesforce background

Strong experience with Salesforce Declarative and Programmatic Customization, including design concepts for security and stability, debugging code and log files, and querying databases for data lookup/update.
Proficiency in version and revision control practices and procedures.
Preferred experience in the Financial Services Industry.
Hold Salesforce Certifications: Certified Administrator, Platform App Builder, Platform Developer I, Platform Developer II, OMNI Studio Developer.
